author: stefanbratanov
content: I wonder if the increased transaction inclusion time with ePBS will be noticeable for users. I guess that gets fixed with slot auctions, but in current design there would be a slight more delay

author: potuz
content: I think once we set the timings correctly this becomes just as it is today or negligible at the most. If we set the payload availability deadline shortly after the attestation deadline, and the attestation deadline shortly after the slot start, we can have the total delay between block building construction and payload being available being more or less the same as today.

author: potuz
content: The vanilla deadlines in the EIP with attestations at 3 and PTC at 9 does add 6 seconds latency that are artificial though
